content.question: The nails and other materials added to the sculpture are intended to

choices.label: activate the spiritual power residing in the figure
express the physical strength and status of the warrior
recall the historical narrative of the local community
demonstrate the wealth of the sculptureâ€™s owner

content.answer: activate the spiritual power residing in the figure

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain how the possible intent, purpose, and/or function shape the creation or meaning of a work of art (or group of related works of art).
